Dear all
GOOD DAY !
pls check suitable cargo for our vessel

Bult: 2/2012, Japan, GT: 17019, NT: 10108
Class: NK LOA/B/D: 169.37 / 27.20 / 13.6 M 5 HO / 5 HA - Hatch Covers: End folding ABT 37,320.63
CBM Grain / 35,742.83 CBM Bale CRANES: 4 x 25 mts
SPEED & CONSUMPTION:
* ECO MODE: (WITHOUT WARRANTY, GIVEN AS GUIDANCE ONLY) LADEN – ABOUT 10.2 KNOTS ON ABOUT 14.60 MTS IFO 380 CST + 0.10 MT MDO,
BALLAST – ABOUT 11.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 14.60 MTS IFO 380 CST + 0.10 MT MDO
* FULL SPEED MODE:
LADEN – ABOUT 11.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 15.90 MTS IFO 380 CST + 0.10 MT MDO,
BALLAST – ABOUT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 15.90 MTS IFO 380 CST + 0.10 MT MDO
* IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 2.20 MTS IFO 380 CST + 0.10 MT MDO.
* WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 4.4 MTS IFO 380 CST + 0.10 MT MDO
Tks & B.rgds/
